title: Capstone reviews
content: How many capstone reviews could be there for 5th sem . I might have to leave 1 weeks of classes in September 1st week due to some unavoidable circumstances so wanted to ask this to  the people who just completed 6th sem

comments.body:
we never had any such reviews in 5th sem.   
Capstone started only in 6th sem only for us.

Capstone starting from 5th sem is new rule
Yeah but we would be doing essentially the same stuff u did in ur 6th sem so I could get an idea by knowing what was ur schedule
Came across this post while searching for it, Could you please tell, in ISA-1 review would there only be the guide as the sole panel member or there would be 3-4 random panel members?
